channel.title: Need Any Help?
channel.description:
Ok if you need help then just reply with what you need help with, i will try my best to fix/help you with your problems.
i might make commands or something like that if not im just ganna tell you how to do it.
Invalid Name.
PS. I will be look at this regulary for bout an hour from now.

item.title: Need Any Help?
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Wicked, no that won’t work. Cases are for objects only, they don’t work for items. If you get the interface, you will need to make a case on the button, which you can get the button id by right clicking on it.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Any Help?
item.dc:creator: @wicked_destiny wicked destiny
item.description:
@wicked_destiny wrote:

[code]else if(itemUsed == 946 && useWith == 1511) { //short bow (u)
if(playerLevel[9] >= 5) {
showinterface(???);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a fletching level of 5 to craft the bow.”);
}
}

case???;

[/code]

but if an interface is shown and i got 3 option wich one i would make
i can choose of making
arrow shaft item id 52
shortbow (u) item id 50
long bow (u) item id 48

should the cases be 52, 50 , 48?

like this

case 52:
if(playerLevel[9] >= 0) {			//arrow shaft  use log with hammer 
						deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1);
						addItem(52, 15);
						addSkillXP(15, 9);
					} else {
						sendMessage("You need a fletching level of 0 to atach the feathers to the shafts.");
					}
break;

and this would be the same for item id 50 and 52

??

or am i thinking in the whole wrong direction

Read full topic

item.title: Need Any Help?

item.description:
@wicked_destiny wrote:

[quote=“Sick of Air, post:14, topic:102824”]Yeah, it’d be

case OBJECTID: if (objectX == COORDOFOBJECTX && objectY == COORDOFOBJECTY) { sendMessage("YOU CLIMB THE STAIRS."); heightLevel += 1; } break;[/quote]

else if (objectX == COORDOFOBJECTX && objectY == COORDOFOBJECTY) { sendMessage("YOU CLIMB THE STAIRS."); heightLevel += 1; }

and know when we are talking about case

item.description:
@wicked_destiny wrote:

thats why i need to know wich interfaces i should use to pop them up
and wich cases are brought up when i click on asn opion on the interface

[code]else if(itemUsed == 1511 && useWith == 2347) {
if(playerLevel[9] >= 0) { //arrow shaft use log with hammer
deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1);
addItem(52, 15);
addSkillXP(15, 9);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a fletching level of 0 to atach the feathers to the shafts.”);
}
}
else if(itemUsed == 2347 && useWith == 1511) {
if(playerLevel[9] >= 0) { //arrow shaft use log with hammer
deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1);
addItem(52, 15);
addSkillXP(15, 9);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a fletching level of 0 to atach the feathers to the shafts.”);
}
}
else if(itemUsed == 314 && useWith == 52) {
if(playerLevel[9] >= 0) { //headles arrows

deleteItem(52, getItemSlot(52), 15);
addItem(53, 15);
addSkillXP(15, 9);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a fletching level of 0 to atach the feathers to the shafts.”);
}
}
else if(itemUsed == 53 && useWith == 39) { //bronze arrows

addItem(882, 15);

}
}
else if(itemUsed == 53 && useWith == 40) { //iron arrows
if(playerLevel[9] >= 15) {

deleteItem(40, getItemSlot(40), 15);
addItem(884, 15);
addSkillXP(57, 9);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a fletching level of 15 to make iron arrows.”);
}
}
else if(itemUsed == 53 && useWith == 41) { //steel arrows
if(playerLevel[9] >= 30) {
deleteItem(53, getItemSlot(53), 15);
deleteItem(41, getItemSlot(41), 15);
addItem(886, 15);
addSkillXP(95, 9);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a fletching level of 30 to make steel arrows.”);
}
}
else if(itemUsed == 53 && useWith == 42) { //mithril arrows
if(playerLevel[9] >= 45) {
deleteItem(53, getItemSlot(53), 15);
deleteItem(42, getItemSlot(42), 15);
addItem(888, 15);
addSkillXP(132, 9);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a fletching level of 45 to make mithril arrows.”);
}
}
else if(itemUsed == 53 && useWith == 43) { //adamant arrows
if(playerLevel[9] >= 60) {
deleteItem(53, getItemSlot(53), 15);
deleteItem(43, getItemSlot(43), 15);
addItem(890, 15);
addSkillXP(165, 9);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a fletching level of 60 to make adamant arrows.”);
}
}
else if(itemUsed == 53 && useWith == 44) { //rune arrows
if(playerLevel[9] >= 75) {
deleteItem(53, getItemSlot(53), 15);
deleteItem(44, getItemSlot(44), 15);
addItem(892, 15);
addSkillXP(225, 9);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a fletching level of 75 to make rune arrows.”);
}
}

// darts

			else if(itemUsed == 314 && useWith == 819) {		//bronze darts
				if(playerLevel[9] >= 1) {
					deleteItem(314, getItemSlot(314), 1);
					deleteItem(819, getItemSlot(819), 1);
					addItem(806, 1);

item.title: Need Any Help?
item.dc:creator: @wicked_destiny wicked destiny
item.description:
@wicked_destiny wrote:

not those those i got i even wrot that for long bow darts and arrows i mean this
